comment: She is extremely helpful and understanding. I went into the class thinking I had no musical talent, but she made the May-Mester class interesting and easy! Take the May-mester. It felt like musical summer camp.

She is AWESOME! I loved this class even though I am not a musical person.... although she tells you almost everyday how "musically intelligent" you are :) She is so sweet and helpful. Very encouraging and not condescending at all when we totally messed up the recorder. (I am terrible!) I wish I could have her for another class. Take her!!

Don't skip her class and practice your recorder. The class is not hard, but do your work.  I really bomb the recorder sharing at the end of the semester and she was pretty nice about it. If you suck at music, like me, just let her see that you tried. Also, she always asked us if we needed extra help. Now that the class is over. It was pretty fun.

Wonderful, fun teacher, content expert, realistic and concerned with each individuals learning progress.  Very do-able projects and expectations are based on trying.  You do not need to be a music expert to ace this class, I am proof of that!

(+) She is willing to work with you on most things. LOVES music.  (-) She only has 1 assignment that focuses on music integration into lessons.  The rest are trying to teach us to be "music" teachers.  You can only miss ONE class or you will be docked 25 points from your final grade.  You could make A's all semester & end up with a B. NOT FAIR!

Wonderful teacher! The class itself is silly, but she does a great job of teaching it, and puts the focus on the application in the classroom. She is very supportive and willing do whatever is necessary for you to do well in her class if you put forth the effort as well! She is very understanding and approachable.

Wonderful professor! Very enthusiastic and knowledgeable. Fun class! She not only teaches about music elements, she gives ideas of how to incorporate music into the classroom. I would defiantly take her again!
Wonderful class, very helpful and kind professor.  This is not an easy class but if you put forth any effort or ask for help, Mrs. Boner is quick to accommodate.
Teacher is not approachable and does not give support in the classroom.
